body.p: Processing of personal data in the services of the Sámi Parliament
Data files concerning the Sámi Parliament’s customers, government grant recipients, elected officials, HR and payroll administration, and stakeholders .
Access control and working hours monitoring system .

Data subjects have the right to inspect their personal data stored in the personal data file and the right to demand the rectification or erasure of their data. Requests to this effect should be delivered in person or in writing to the contact person.

Under the GDPR, data subjects have the right to object to processing or request the restriction of processing their data, as well as the right to file a complaint about the processing of their personal data with the supervisory authority.
